snippet.title: Chinese cemetery company Fu Shou Yuan digs profits from aging population
snippet.description:
* Like many companies in China, Fu Shou Yuan uses celebrities to attract clients. Except, in this case, they're dead.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/02/18/world/asia/china-cemetery-business/index.html

snippet.title: 5 bed and breakfasts: A warm welcome in Paris
snippet.description:
* Faced with too many visitors, the city of Paris asked its citizens to open their homes as B&Bs. It doesn't get more authentique than that.
http://www.cnn.com/2008/TRAVEL/getaways/07/24/paris.bed.breakfasts/index.html

snippet.title: Best Easter egg hunts around the world
snippet.description:
* Searching living rooms and closets for your eggs may be fun the first six times, but if the novelty's wearing thinner than a chocolate egg's foil wrapping, there are more adventurous egg trails out there.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/17/travel/easter-egg-hunts/index.html

snippet.title: Obamas open up South Lawn to eager children for Easter Egg Roll
snippet.description:
* Washington (CNN) â€“ President Barack Obama and First Lady Michelle Obama joined the Easter Bunny to welcome a crowd of children, parents and volunteers to the White House South Lawn on Monday for the 136th annual Easter Egg Roll. The first couple walked...
http://politicalticker.blogs.cnn.com/2014/04/21/obamas-open-up-south-lawn-to-eager-children-for-easter-egg-roll/

snippet.title: 9 quirky U.S. hotel traditions
snippet.description:
* Lots of hotels have traditions. Nightly happy hours or free check-in snacks aren't that unusual.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/27/travel/hotel-traditions/index.html

snippet.title: Lives, not numbers: Snapshots of Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 passengers
snippet.description:
* Amid the void of information on their fates, it seems at times that the passengers and crew of Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 have been reduced to a number.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/15/world/asia/malaysia-airlines-passenger-vignettes/index.html

snippet.title: Kiwi climb: Hoofing up the world's steepest street
snippet.description:
* Its claim to fame has been contested, it's been hit by tragedy and it's been photographed by tourists from around the world.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/04/travel/worlds-steepest-street-residents/index.html

snippet.title: Why traditional dating is dead
snippet.description:
* Valentine's Day is here. If you're single, you will likely find yourself assessing and reassessing your love life. Your Instagram feed full of perfectly filtered photos of roses, chocolates and TMI kisses will be a constant reminder that you are not in love and not in a relationship.
http://www.cnn.com/2013/02/13/opinion/massa-end-of-dating/index.html

snippet.title: North and South Korea hold first family reunion in three years
snippet.description:
* Families torn apart for more than 60 years -- separated by the Korean War -- began to reunite at a mountain resort in North Korea Thursday.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/02/20/world/asia/koreas-reunion/index.html

snippet.title: Supreme cuisine: New cookbook honors late husband of Justice Ginsburg
snippet.description:
* The photo is both touching and humorous, a loving couple dressed as many of their friends and colleagues recall them....
http://eatocracy.cnn.com/2011/12/14/supreme-cuisine-new-cookbook-honors-late-husband-of-justice-ginsburg/
